citeinfo.title: Waterways: Santa Clara County, California, 2015
citeinfo.othercit: Retrieved on Friday, August 14, 2015 from the County of Santa Clara Valley Water District ArcGIS.com Gallery at https://valleywater.maps.arcgis.com/home/gallery.html#c=organization&o=numviews&f=layers-layerfiles.

citeinfo.title: Santa Clara County, California GIS Maps and Data

descript.abstract: This polyline shapefile depicts centerlines for waterways in the County of Santa Clara, California, including canals, canyons, channels, creeks and gulches. The Santa Clara Valley Water District manages an integrated water resources system that includes the supply of clean, safe water, flood protection and stewardship of streams on behalf of Santa Clara County's 1.8 million residents. This layer is part of a collection of GIS data for Santa Clara County, California.
descript.purpose: To map creeks and canals within Santa Clara County based on the 2001 county-wide orthophotos.

SCVWD disclaims, and shall not be held liable for, any and all damage, loss, or liability, whether direct, indirect, or consequential, which arises or may arise from these products or the use thereof by any person or entity.
